intro.paragraph1: Urusengero rwa Orbital ni satelite ifite ubutumwa bwubuhanzi: urwibutso mumwanya wo hanze rwugururiwe buri kiremwa muntu cyose cyabayeho cyangwa cyabayeho kwisi.
intro.paragraph2: Binyuze muburyo bwa tekinoloji, umuntu wese arashobora kohereza izina ryumuntu murusengero, yaba umuntu wapfuye, umuntu muzima cyane, cyangwa ikiremwa cyose gikwiye kwibukwa.

sculpture.heading: Igishusho
sculpture.paragraph1: Ibihangano bifite ibintu bitatu bifitanye isano: icyogajuru cyagenewe cyane cyane kubika amazina ya miliyari; igishusho rusange gihana amakuru na satelite; n'urubuga abitabiriye bohereza amazina, guhera ubu kugeza bapfuye, mwijuru.
sculpture.paragraph2: Nkibikorwa byinshi, Urusengero rwa Orbital rushobora gufatwa nkigishushanyo cyihariye, kibera ahantu. Numushinga wa Artsat.

antenna.heading: Antenna nkigishushanyo rusange
antenna.paragraph2: Hateguwe antenne izaba iri mu itumanaho ritaziguye na satelite ya orbital.
antenna.paragraph3: Hamwe nubuso bwa zahabu bwerekana, bwerekana ikirere hejuru yacyo, ni intangiriro yo gukangurira abantu benshi (cyangwa isano yacu nibiri hejuru).
antenna.paragraph4: Mugihe ibishusho bidashyizwe mubice byinshi byisi, Frames yacu kuva kwisi, kuri ubu igenzura icyogajuru, yohereza amazina kuri buri nzira.
antenna.paragraph5: Fasha kuzana iyerekwa mumujyi wawe - gushiraho ibishusho bya antenne bitera ibiganiro kubyerekeranye nubushakashatsi bwikirere, ubuhanzi, nu mwanya dusangiye mwisi. Wige byinshi kubyerekeye gushyigikira umushinga .
